name: Color Jumper (itch) (Shadon)
description:
Color Jumper is a challenging 2D platformer - easy to learn but hard to master!

8 unique levels to test your skill.

Made for the "3-Button, 3-Color" Game Jam.
I really hope that you enjoy playing it as much as I enjoyed making it!

Any kind of feedback is very much appreciated :)

Supported Controls

WASD and arrow keys, controller
